thread.title: Tina and Bobby Moore's relationship in pictures: A heartbreaking love story
thread.title_full: Tina and Bobby Moore's relationship in pictures: A heartbreaking love story

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Tina and Bobby Moore's relationship in pictures: A heartbreaking love story
text:
They were together almost three decades (Photo: Getty) Share   
Bobby Moore is arguably the most iconic English sporting hero of all time, but many remember him for his time off the pitch too. 
Bobby, who met his first wife Tina when he was just 17-years-old, quickly fell in love with the blonde bombshell. 
But he wasn't the only one to fall for her charms, the country was quick to follow. 
They soon became the celebrity golden couple of their era, and their relationship was idolised by many. They met when Bobby was 17 They stayed together through thick and thin (Photo: Mirrorpix) 
While Bobby scored on the pitch, Tina turned her eye to modelling and carved out a career for herself as the country's very first WAG. 
Despite being a seemingly glamorous couple, Tina herself has stressed what an ordinary couple they were, before Bobby's football career took off. 
Speaking recently, she said: "Ours was a dramatic life, but you can't think like that when you're living it. They became the UK's golden couple (Photo: Getty) They went on to start a family together (Photo: Popperfoto/Getty) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
